text: “ ‘Wuod ruoth noyud lowo mogoyo tongʼ gi alwora mar gwengʼ maler kod kama ogerie dala maduongʼ. Yo podho chiengʼ lop wuod ruoth nochop nyaka e dho nam, to yo wuok chiengʼ lopno nogiki e tongʼ piny. Kuom mano borne koa yo wuok chiengʼ nyaka yo podho chiengʼ nobed maromre gi lowo mopogne dhoot ka dhoot mar Israel.
